group_1.textRight: Hey, you sure got here early.

group_1.textLeft: Yo. Sorry for callin' you over on such short notice.
I don't mind.
But, you know...
I didn't expect to be meeting up at Ryuugasaki's@old base with Juri and her right-hand man.
That doesn't really put me at ease.

group_1.textRight: It's better that the First and Third Sisters aren't here@this time, y'know?
And hey, this was Juri the Great's decision@in the first place.

group_1.textLeft: Does that mean you've got something secret@to tell me?

group_1.textRight: Nah, I'm runnin' a little investigation.
You blew it the last time you tried to kill@Iroha Tamaki, right?
That's been bugging me, so I looked into some stuff@with Ranka...
The locations of Ui Tamaki and the catacombs got@leaked, and our pincer attack...
...at Futatsugi City Station was a bust.@Seems kinda fishy, don't you think?

group_1.textLeft: So you're interrogating me because I'm the@prime suspect.

group_1.textRight: Bingo.
I don't think you're enough of a scrub to screw up@such a simple operation.
What's going on?
Just so ya know, I'll torch you if you lie to me.

group_1.textLeft: ...I won't lie to you.@The truth is...
I let the pincer attack at the station fail so that@Yachiyo Nanami's group could escape.
I also told the Union where Ui Tamaki was being@held, and where the catacombs were.

group_1.textRight: Fessed up easier than I thought, huh...
You know the price for betrayin' Juri the Great@and her friends, don't ya?

group_1.textLeft: I'm willing to take full responsibility for your plans@failing...
I just...didn't want Yuna to cross that line.

group_1.textRight: What "line"...?

group_1.textLeft: Hurting someone that she knows so well, I mean.
I didn't want her to kill Iroha Tamaki or Ui Tamaki,@because no matter how much...
...she hates them, they've still spoken with@each other so many times...

group_1.textRight: There's no such thing as a demon refusing to kill@'cause she got all mushy over the enemy!

group_1.textLeft: She might be a demon driven by revenge now,
but the real Yuna is a kind, merciful girl, even to@her enemies...
If I let her cross that line, she'll never be able to@go back to her kind self...!

group_1.textRight: Sis made her choice.@She ain't going back to the way she was.

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm not giving up.

group_1.textRight: Your ego's a bigger pain in the ass than our plans@getting crushed.
Now, how do you wanna get cooked?@I'll leave it up to you...

group_1.textLeft: In the end, I know I betrayed Futatsugi,
so I can't blame you for wanting to kill me...
But...

group_1.textRight: Yeah?

group_1.textLeft: I think Yuna should make the final decision.

group_1.textRight: You think Sis is gonna let you off the hook?

group_1.textLeft: I'm not expecting her to.
I just want her to know how I feel...

group_1.textRight: I always thought you were a stubborn, annoying@punk.
Guess you're still the same now that ya turned on us.

group_1.textCenter: [flashEffect:explosion]Screw Sis's decision,@I'm ending this shit NOW!

group_1.textRight: Juri, stop!
Taking out Sakuya right here would be@a godawful idea!

group_1.textCenter: Tch. Looks like you get to live, fuckin'@track team bitch.

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:302100:lipSynch_1]Phew.

group_1.textRight: I'm pissed too...but Sakuya's right. We should@leave this up to the First Sister.
C'mon, let's go.

group_1.textLeft: Fiiine...

group_1.textRight: Oh, and Sakuya...
You won't get a second chance.
